the first few increase rounds it may be difficult to see where to insert hook in the free loops of the round below because there are more sts on the outer round than the round you are reaching into do the best you can but don t worry if a double_crochet lines up with a double_crochet from a previous round it will become easier to identify the free loop to work into when you reach 60 sts the double crochets will be evenly staggered in the seed stitch pattern from that point on round 1 chain 4 join into ring or wind loop of yarn around finger and work over strands of loop to form beginning ring
